original_query.title: Deep Neural Networks
original_query.description: Which papers talk about Deep Neural Networks?
original_query.narrative: Relevant papers have at least one mention of Deep Neural. Paper containing only Deep or Neural are not relevant.

original_query.title: Information Retrieval
original_query.description: Which papers talk about Information Retrieval?
original_query.narrative: Relevant paper have at least one mention of Information Retrieval. Paper containing only Information or Retrieval are not relevant.

original_query.title: Analysis for Android apps
original_query.description: Which papers talk about the analysis of android apps?
original_query.narrative: Relevant papers talk at least in one line about android apps. Paper containing only apps are not relevant.

original_query.title: The University of Amsterdam
original_query.description: Which papers are created by the University of Amsterdam?
original_query.narrative: Relevant papers are created or at least co-written by the University of Amsterdam. Paper containing only University not relevant.

topic.query: Neural Ranking for eCommerce Product Search

original_query.title: Neural Ranking for eCommerce Product Search
original_query.description: Which paper is about Ranking Product Search and its applications in eCommerce?
original_query.narrative: Relevant papers that addresses application of Task Models and Textual Embeddings in the field of electronic commerce. Not relevant are papers showcasing applications that do not contain the topic eCommerce.

original_query.title: web pages evolution
original_query.description: Which paper is about the evolution of web pages?
original_query.narrative: Relevant paper have at least one mention of web evolution. Paper containing only web page or evolution are not relevant.
